markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=1681)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 358 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Halcamora](/Deities.aspx?ID=120), [Hearth and Harvest](/Deities.aspx?ID=252)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You can ask questions of and receive answers from [plants](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) and [fungi](/Traits.aspx?ID=77), but the spell doesn't make them more friendly or intelligent than normal. Most normal plants and fungi have a distinctive view of the world around them, so they don't recognize details about creatures or know anything about the world beyond their immediate vicinity. Cunning plant or fungus monsters are likely to be terse and evasive, while less intelligent ones often make inane comments.

---
**Heightened (4th)** The duration is 8 hours.
name: Speak with Plants

</row>

</row>

---

<summary>
Communicate with plants and plant creatures.
</summary>
summary: Communicate with plants and plant creatures.

Most normal plants and fungi have a distinctive view of the world around them, so they don't recognize details about creatures or know anything about the world beyond their immediate vicinity. Cunning plant or fungus monsters are likely to be terse and evasive, while less intelligent ones often make inane comments. --- Heightened (4th) The duration is 8 hours.
